name: Wish I Hadn't
description:
Jamie Barris isn't sure what she wants to do with her life. Now that she's out of work, her mom's pushing her to take over the family business. 

Will wandering her hometown make things better or worse? Can she get away from the ghosts of her old friends?

Created for Toadhouse Visual Novel Game Jam.

Cover art edited from photo by Sharon Drummond on flickr.
